about_the_game:
Fast Royal – A Futuristic, High-Intensity Battle Royale Experience

Fast Royal is a next-generation battle royale game that brings an intense, strategic, and high-speed combat experience to players. Unlike traditional battle royale games, Fast Royal introduces destructible environments, deep upgrade mechanics, and an unforgiving survival system, making every match a unique and adrenaline-fueled challenge.

Fully Destructible Arena

One of the defining features of Fast Royal is its fully destructible environment. Every structure, from walls to barriers, can be obliterated using powerful weapons or strategic planning. This means that cover is never permanent, and players must constantly adapt their tactics. A safe hideout can be blown apart in an instant, forcing players into dynamic combat scenarios.

Upgrade System – Weapons & Characters

Fast Royal features an advanced upgrade system that allows players to enhance both their weapons and their robotic character during matches. Instead of relying on traditional loot mechanics, players collect "mechanical points" by opening loot crates or defeating enemies. These points can be spent in real-time to improve:

  • Weapons – Increasing damage, fire rate, ammo capacity, and efficiency.

  • Character Stats – Boosting health, shields, speed, agility, energy, and overall performance.

This mechanic adds a MOBA-like progression within a battle royale setting, offering deep customization and adaptability mid-game.

No Healing – Only Survivors Thrive

Unlike other battle royale games, Fast Royal does not allow players to heal. Once you take damage, there’s no turning back. This design forces players to be extremely cautious, strategic, and aggressive in securing eliminations without reckless engagements.

The lack of healing encourages:

  • More tactical gameplay – Avoid unnecessary fights unless you’re confident.

  • Efficient upgrades – Strengthen defenses instead of relying on healing items.

  • A high-risk, high-reward system – Every decision counts, and mistakes are costly.

Energy Management – The Key to Survival

In Fast Royal, robots run on energy, which is essential for all functions, including movement and combat. Instead of regenerating automatically, energy must be replenished using batteries, which can be found in loot crates or dropped by defeated enemies.

Energy serves as the core survival resource, meaning that players must:

  • Strategically manage movement and abilities to avoid running out of power.

  • Prioritize collecting batteries while securing kills and loot.

  • Balance offense and defense to conserve resources.

Why Fast Royal Stands Out

With fast-paced gameplay, strategic depth, and complete arena destruction, Fast Royal offers a fresh take on the battle royale genre. Every match is unpredictable, every encounter is intense, and only the smartest, most adaptive players will claim victory.

Do you have what it takes to survive, destroy, and dominate in Fast Royal?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 / Core i5-2500K o AMD: Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 o AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (or newer)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K o AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 o AMD Radeon RX 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
